group_1.textLeft: A cosmic crisis… Um…@What are we supposed to do?!

group_1.narration: "Unusual magic has been detected at@several locations besides this one…@It could be a prelude to something big happening,@so we need to investigate and@figure out what's going on!"
"And this needs to be resolved promptly,@for every time places are swapped,@the universe is brought one step@closer to annihilation."

group_1.textRight: Assuming the patchwork phenomenon@was created by a person…

group_1.textLeft: If magic can be sensed at the scene, then@it's bound to be the work of a Magical Girl.
…Yes, Senpai. I'm ready to go.[ad]

group_1.textRight: I couldn't imagine that the two of them@would…
...I wonder if this is what they were@preparing for…?
…We might be running out of time.

group_1.textLeft: Then we'll go back to that rooftop and@capture both of them and... um...

group_1.textRight: I was going to arrest them after@you were taken out.
However, when I returned there, that space@they were in was already gone.

group_1.textLeft: I…see. Now that we found them, I suppose@they needed to change their hideout.

group_1.textRight: In any case, let's look for them! They must@be somewhere in Kamihama City!

group_1.textLeft: Sure thing!
Eh, why, Kurumi?!

group_1.narration: "This could be an opportunity@for Chisato and Takina."
"If we take advantage of the patchwork mechanism,@there's a chance we could find a way@for both of you to return to our world…"

group_1.textLeft: No, you can't say that…!

group_1.narration: [bgEffect:shakeSmall] "Right now we haven't found a way@for you to come back yet!"
"It may be our only shot.@…Once we resolve this  issue, you guys@might not be able to return afterwards."

group_1.textLeft: …Thanks, Kurumi.
But if the universe disappears, we won't@be able to go home anyways.
So everything will be a-okay!
Even if we can't return right now,@I'm sure we'll figure it out later.
If we all work together, we can make it work!@Yeah!
I am a little worried though.
I wonder if Café LycoReco will go out of@business while its poster girl is gone.

group_1.narration: "...*Sigh* You dummy.@We could manage without you,@it's just that the entire literal café@is over there right now."

group_1.textLeft: Oh yeah, that's right!

group_1.narration: "Fine, you guys can do whatever you want,@but Mizuki was ranting about her favorite booze@being stuck over there, so come back soon...@Wait, you're not gonna drink it, are you?"

group_1.textLeft: C'mon, what are you talking about?@Everyone here is…[chara:406101:lipSynch_0][wait:1.2][chara:406101:cheek_0][chara:406101:face_mtn_ex_050.exp3.json][chara:406101:lipSynch_1]under the drinking age…?

group_1.textRight: So then? ...Have you decided@on a course of action?

group_1.textLeft: Yeah! Let's go save the universe@and stuff, yeah?

group_1.textRight: So, um... What should we do first?

group_1.textLeft: At any rate, we still don't know@the mechanics or motive.
Although I'm not sure how we'll pursue them@now, since we lost their scent on the rooftop.
We need to figure out where they relocated.

group_1.textRight: But those location swaps…are happening@all over the place.

group_1.textLeft: Oh, should I ask all those Magical Girls we@made friends with in Kamihama for help?

group_1.textRight: The reason you were enjoying yourself@in Kamihama so much is suddenly clear!

group_1.textLeft: Maybe, but I doubt Chisato was thinking@that far ahead.

group_1.textRight: We should send word to everyone@and request their assistance.

group_1.textCenter: A lot of Magical Girls are on the move.@I have to go tell Senpai.
It's the right thing to do.@…For Senpai.
This is another precious sacrifice that@must be made to fulfill her will.
